actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-958.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of the Committee on International Relations for the investigations and studies to be conducted pursuant to rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Authorizes the expenditure of $1,051,169.24 by the House Committee on International Relations for inquiries and investigations. Allocates $75,000 to be expended for the procurement of consultant services. Requires the chairman of the Committee to furnish the Committee on House Administration information with respect to any study or investigation intended to be financed from such funds.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of the Committee on International Relations for the investigations and studies to be conducted pursuant to rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives.
